name: Notion Habit Tracker (With onboarding)
description: A simple yet powerful habit tracker for Notion.Pre-populated database from now until the end of 2022Simple to add an remove your habitsHabits are property based for easy update, sorting, calculations and data flexibilityPowerful database views for weekly and monthly reviewLinked Goals database with Progress BarsEasy to use with on-boarding video
features: Pre-populated database from now until the end of 2022; Simple to add an remove your habits; Habits are property based for easy update, sorting, calculations  and data flexibility; Powerful database views for weekly and monthly review; Linked Goals database with Progress Bars; Easy to use with on-boarding video
